thread.title: Group presses to allow abortion for raped 10-year-old - CNN Video
thread.title_full: Group presses to allow abortion for raped 10-year-old - CNN Video

title: Group presses to allow abortion for raped 10-year-old - CNN Video
text: Group presses Paraguay to allow abortion for raped girl, 10 By Jason Hanna and Rafael Romo, CNN An international rights group is pressing the Paraguayan government to allow an abortion for a 10-year-old girl who allegedly was impregnated by her stepfather -- a procedure that health officials in the South American country have so far blocked. More from World
